flawed_nl_solution:
The discount on the shoes Marcus found is 120 * 30/100 = $<<120*30/100=36>>36.
That means he only had to pay 120 - 36 = $<<120-36=48>>48.
So Marcus was able to save 130 - 48 = $<<130-48=82>>82.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 84, not 48. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
